issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Base UI > Views > Scroll Views > Scrollable Views

Actual Result:
Starts on Page 1 and hitting jump goes to page 3

Expected Result:
Should start on page 2
fields.summary: iOS: Scrollable view starts  on the wrong page and jumps to page 3
fields.environment: Tested with ipod touch 4GT (4.1) Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/05/11 00:38 f8dfdf7...)
